snippet: The Festival of Contemporary Music, a staple at Tanglewood, began on Thursday with works by Elliott Carter, Harrison Birtwistle, Niccolò Castiglioni, Luke Bedford and Sean Shepherd.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performances at the Tanglewood Festival of Contemporary Music in Lenox, Mass.
lead_paragraph: The Festival of Contemporary Music, a staple at Tanglewood, began on Thursday with works by Elliott Carter, Harrison Birtwistle, Niccolò Castiglioni, Luke Bedford and Sean Shepherd.

headline.seo: Festival of Contemporary Music at Tanglewood
headline.main: For a Leafy Preserve, Reliably Uncommon Compositions
headline.print_headline: For a Leafy Preserve, Reliably Uncommon Compositions
